name: Left Handed Giant Run Club
description: A weekly social running club meeting at the Left Handed Giant taproom.
details: The group has an official website linked below, and further up to date information can be found on the groups instagram page.

events.name: Tuesday Run
events.details: There are three running groups split into 4km, 6km and 8km routes; all routes stop roughly halfway through the run to pause and regroup. As a social running group everyone is encouraged to run at their own pace and people typically stay behind after the run to enjoy a drink together. There are no changing facilities at the bar, but there are toilets and a place to drop bags.

time.details: The run starts at 6:30PM, waiver signing / bag drop starts from 6:00PM onwards.

location.address: Left Handed Giant Brewpub, Finzels Reach, BS1 6EU

cost.details: Free to attend, attendees who join the run get 10% off drinks at the bar.

booking.details: No booking is required; please bring a smartphone so you can sign an electronic waiver.

events.name: Thursday Run
events.details: There are three running groups that split into 6km, 8km and 10km routes.

time.details: The run starts at 6:30PM, waiver signing / bag drop starts from 6:00PM onwards.

location.address: Left Handed Giant Brewery & Tap Room, St Philips Rd, BS2 0JE

cost.details: Free to attend, attendees who join the run get 10% off drinks at the bar.

booking.details: No booking is required; please bring a smartphone so you can sign an electronic waiver.
